description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The world of Music and Purpleness has been invaded by the Musickness, turning healthy notes Pink and Green! Do what you can to save as many of them as possible!
description.short: The world of Music and Purpleness has been invaded by the Musickness, turning healthy notes Pink and Green! Do what you can to save as many of them as possible!
